word:
5 - A Most Beautiful Place

Sources: SpTB12x pp. 13-15; LDE pg. 102
1904
     The Huntsville School Farm is a most beautiful place, and with its three hundred and more acres of land, should accomplish much in the line of industrial training and
82
the raising of crops. Heavenly angels will be able to read, in the thrift and painstaking effort revealed in the care of the farm, the story of the improvement made by the students themselves in character-building.
